item.title: Unlocking Secrets: A Guide to Integrate Azure Key Vault with GitLab
item.description: Introduction Lately, I have experienced issues using other popular key vault providers. So, I demonstrated using the Azure key vault in Azure DevOps. A question popped up: How do we use Az key vault in GitLab? Below links gives the direction… GitLab &amp; Azure Key Vault Azure AD Federated Identity Credential Isnâ€™t it like breathing? Nope! It is not! This blog post is to show you the easiest way! I followed the instructions and came up with the most straightforward way
